name: The Mandalorian, Chapter 3: The Sin
description:
A reimagining of The Mandalorian, Chapter 3: The Sin as a  Game Boy game. 

This is a work of fan art by my son and I. It is not for sale.

Controls: 

Direction – Arrow Keys

Action (A / B Buttons) – J / K

Start – Enter

There is an Easter Egg that allows you to play a portion as Ahsoka Tano.
We are constantly tinkering with this, so let me know if you encounter any issues.

I did a walkthrough presentation for the Roc Game Fest.
You can also read about the game in this write-up in PRINT Magazine.
